subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Founded in 1967, the Yacht Club Costa Smeralda, host of the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup race, is setting pace for its elders.
snippet: Founded in 1967, the Yacht Club Costa Smeralda, host of the Maxi Yacht Rolex Cup race, is setting pace for its elders.
